reports.title: GRAFO TOTAL
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred))
RETURN t

reports.title: TOP 20 puertos más utilizados
reports.query:
MATCH (n:Port)
WITH n.number AS atributo, count(*) AS cantidad
RETURN atributo, cantidad
ORDER BY cantidad DESC
LIMIT 20

reports.title: Nº ORGANIZACIONES
reports.query:
MATCH (n:ORG)
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT n)

reports.title: ACTIVOS/ORG
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP))
RETURN o.org AS Organización, COUNT(DISTINCT ip.address) AS Activos

reports.title: Porcentaje de nodos con capturas
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[r:HAS_SCREENSHOT]->(scr:Screenshot)
WITH o, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS totalNodos, COUNT(DISTINCT r) AS nodosConRelacion
RETURN o.org AS ORGANIZACIÓN, toString(round(nodosConRelacion * 100.0 / totalNodos, 2)) + '%' AS CAPTURAS

reports.title: Porcentaje de nodos con códigos fuente
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[r:HAS_WEBSOURCE]->(scr:`Web Source`)
WITH o, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS totalNodos, COUNT(DISTINCT r) AS nodosConRelacion
RETURN o.org AS ORGANIZACIÓN, toString(round(nodosConRelacion * 100.0 / totalNodos, 2)) + '%' AS CÓDIGOS_FUENTE

reports.title: Porcentaje de nodos con vulnerabilidades
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[r:HAS_VULNS]->(scr:Vulners)
WITH o, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS totalNodos, COUNT(DISTINCT r) AS nodosConRelacion
RETURN o.org AS ORGANIZACIÓN, toString(round(nodosConRelacion * 100.0 / totalNodos, 2)) + '%' AS VULNERABILIDADES

reports.title: INDICADORES ACTIVOS/ORGANIZACIÓN
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[hp:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[r:HAS_SCREENSHOT]->(scr:Screenshot)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[g:HAS_WEBSOURCE]->(web:`Web Source`)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[v:HAS_VULNS]->(vuln:Vulners)
WITH o, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS totalNodos, COUNT(DISTINCT ip.address) AS ACTIVOS_ÚNICOS, COUNT(DISTINCT r) AS nodosConRelacionr, COUNT(DISTINCT g) AS nodosConRelaciong, COUNT(DISTINCT g) AS nodosConRelacionv
RETURN o.org AS ORGANIZACIÓN, ACTIVOS_ÚNICOS

reports.title: FILTRO DINÁMICO DE BÚSQUEDA (LIMITADO)
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[r:HAS_SCREENSHOT]->(scr:Screenshot)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[g:HAS_WEBSOURCE]->(web:`Web Source`)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[v:HAS_VULNS]->(vuln:Vulners)
RETURN o.org AS Organización, seg.seg AS Segmento, sub.range AS Subred, ip.address AS IP, p.Hostname AS Hostname, COLLECT(p.number) AS Port, COLLECT(scr.Screenshot) AS Screenshot, COLLECT(web.websource) AS WebSource, COLLECT(vuln.vuln) AS Vulnerabilidad

reports.title: INDICADORES CAPTURAS/ORGANIZACIÓN
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[hp:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[r:HAS_SCREENSHOT]->(scr:Screenshot)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[g:HAS_WEBSOURCE]->(web:`Web Source`)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[v:HAS_VULNS]->(vuln:Vulners)
WITH o, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS totalNodos, COUNT(DISTINCT ip.address) AS ACTIVOS_ÚNICOS, COUNT(DISTINCT r) AS nodosConRelacionr, COUNT(DISTINCT g) AS nodosConRelaciong, COUNT(DISTINCT g) AS nodosConRelacionv
RETURN o.org AS ORGANIZACIÓN, toString(round(nodosConRelacionr * 100.0 / totalNodos, 2)) AS CAPTURAS

reports.title: INDICADORES CÓDIGOS FUENTE/ORGANIZACIÓN
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[hp:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[r:HAS_SCREENSHOT]->(scr:Screenshot)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[g:HAS_WEBSOURCE]->(web:`Web Source`)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[v:HAS_VULNS]->(vuln:Vulners)
WITH o, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS totalNodos, COUNT(DISTINCT ip.address) AS ACTIVOS_ÚNICOS, COUNT(DISTINCT r) AS nodosConRelacionr, COUNT(DISTINCT g) AS nodosConRelaciong, COUNT(DISTINCT g) AS nodosConRelacionv
RETURN o.org AS ORGANIZACIÓN, toString(round(nodosConRelaciong * 100.0 / totalNodos, 2)) AS CÓDIGOS_FUENTE

reports.title: INDICADORES VULNERABILIDADES/ORGANIZACIÓN
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[hp:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[r:HAS_SCREENSHOT]->(scr:Screenshot)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[g:HAS_WEBSOURCE]->(web:`Web Source`)
OPTIONAL MATCH (p)-[v:HAS_VULNS]->(vuln:Vulners)
WITH o, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS totalNodos, COUNT(DISTINCT ip.address) AS ACTIVOS_ÚNICOS, COUNT(DISTINCT r) AS nodosConRelacionr, COUNT(DISTINCT g) AS nodosConRelaciong, COUNT(DISTINCT v) AS nodosConRelacionv
RETURN o.org AS ORGANIZACIÓN, toString(round(nodosConRelacionv * 100.0 / totalNodos, 2)) AS VULNERABILIDADES

reports.title: INDICADORES PROTOCOLOS/ORGANIZACIÓN
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[hp:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
WITH o, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS totalNodos, COUNT(DISTINCT p.number) AS PROTOCOLOS_DISTINTOS
RETURN o.org AS ORGANIZACIÓN, PROTOCOLOS_DISTINTOS
## INDICADORES POR ORGANIZACIÓN
## BÚSQUEDA DINÁMICA

# INFORMACIÓN GLOBAL DE TODOS LOS ESCANEOS EJECUTADOS 

## Índice

- Elementos informativos
- Búsqueda dinámica
- Indicadores
## ELEMENTOS INFORMATIVOS

reports.title: ACTIVOS IGUALES DESCUBIERTOS EN DISTINTAS ORGANIZACIOONES BASADO EN LAS CAPTURAS DE PANTALLA
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o1:ORG)-[HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[hv:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[hi:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[hp:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)-[r:HAS_SCREENSHOT]->(scr:Screenshot)<-[r2:HAS_SCREENSHOT]-(p2:Port))
WHERE p.org <> p2.org and scr.Screenshot <> '' AND scr.Screenshot <> ''
RETURN t

reports.title: ORGANIZACIÓN
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`ORG`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`org`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`org` as value,  n.`org` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: PROTOCOLOS
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org 
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT p.number)

reports.title: Nº ACTIVOS
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org 
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT ip.address)

reports.title: VULNERS
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)-[:HAS_VULNS]->(vulns:Vulners)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org 
RETURN COUNT(vulns)

reports.title: CAPTURAS
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)-[:HAS_SCREENSHOT]-(scr:Screenshot)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org 
RETURN COUNT(scr)

reports.title: ACTIVOS REPETIDOS EN BASE A LAS CAPTURAS DE PANTALLA
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[*]->(n:Screenshot)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org 
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT ID(n)) AS unique_ids

reports.title: GRAFO DE TODA LA ORGANIACIÓN
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred))
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org 
RETURN t

reports.title: GRAFO DINAMICO SERVICIOS
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port))
WHERE  p.number = $neodash_port_number AND o.org = $neodash_org_org
RETURN t

reports.title: PUERTO
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Port`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`number`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`number` as value,  n.`number` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Puertos utilizados
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org 
WITH p.number AS atributo, count(*) AS cantidad
RETURN atributo, cantidad
ORDER BY cantidad DESC
LIMIT 20

reports.title: Nº Activos/Protocolo
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port))
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org
RETURN p.number AS Servicios, COUNT(ip.address) AS Activos

reports.title: GRAFO CON VULNERABILIDADES
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)-[:HAS_VULNS]->(v:Vulners))
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org
RETURN t

reports.title: IPS VISIBLES DESDE MÚLTIPLES SEGMENTOS (PIVOTE)
reports.query:
MATCH t=((ip1:IP)<-[hi1:HAS_IP]-(sub1:Subred)<-[hv1:HAS_VISIBILITY]-(seg1:SEG)<-[hs1:HAS_SEG]-(o:ORG)-[HAS_SEG]->(seg2:SEG)-[hv2:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub2:Subred)-[hi2:HAS_IP]->(ip2:IP))
WHERE (ip1.address = ip2.address) AND (o.org = $neodash_org_org)
RETURN t

reports.title: GRAFO CON PROTOCOLS INSEGUROS (SIN CIFRADO) (LIMITADO)
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port))
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org and (p.number IN ['20','21','23','80','8080'])
RETURN t
LIMIT 200

reports.title: PUERTOS ABIERTOS
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org
RETURN COUNT(p.number)

reports.title: WEB SOURCE
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)-[:HAS_WEBSOURCE]->(web:`Web Source`)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org 
RETURN COUNT(web)

reports.title: PUERTOS INSEGUROS
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port))
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org AND (p.number IN ['20','21','23','80','8080'])
WITH ip, p
ORDER BY p.number ASC
RETURN p.number AS Puertos, COLLECT(ip.address) AS Activos

reports.title: ACTIVO
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`IP`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`address`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`address` as value,  n.`address` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: GRAFO DINAMICO ACTIVOS
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port))
WHERE  ip.address = $neodash_ip_address AND o.org = $neodash_org_org
RETURN t

reports.title: GRUPOS DE ACTIVOS EN BASE A LAS CAPTURAS DE PANTALLA
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[hp:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)-[r:HAS_SCREENSHOT]->(scr:Screenshot)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org
RETURN ip, hp, p, r, scr
# CONTROL DE CAMBIOS
# POSIBLES ELEMENTOS CRÍTICOS
# ELEMENTOS INFORMATIVOS

# INFORMACIÓN ESPECÍFICA POR ORGANIZACIÓN

## Índice

- Elementos infromativos
- Búsqueda dinámica
- Posibles elementos críticos
- Control de cambios

reports.title: FILTRO DINÁMICO DE BÚSQUEDA
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org
OPTIONAL MATCH (o)-[*]->(p)-[:HAS_SCREENSHOT]->(scr:Screenshot)
OPTIONAL MATCH (o)-[*]->(p)-[:HAS_WEBSOURCE]->(web:`Web Source`)
OPTIONAL MATCH (o)-[*]->(p)-[:HAS_VULNS]->(vuln:Vulners)
RETURN o.org AS Organización, seg.seg AS Segmento, sub.range AS Subred, ip.address AS IP, p.Hostname AS Hostname, COLLECT(p.number) AS Port, COLLECT(scr.Screenshot) AS Screenshot, COLLECT(web.websource) AS WebSource, COLLECT(vuln.vuln) AS Vulnerabilidad

reports.title: PUERTOS INSEGUROS
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port)
WHERE (o.org = $neodash_org_org) AND (p.number IN ['20','21','23','80','8080'])
RETURN COUNT(p.number)

reports.title: Subredes /24
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org 
RETURN DISTINCT sub.range AS Subredes

reports.title: Nº subredes /24
reports.query:
MATCH (o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org 
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT sub.range)
# BÚSQUEDA DINÁMICA

reports.title: Cambios posteriores a esta fecha
reports.query:
MATCH (n:`Port`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`Date`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`Date` as value,  n.`Date` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Fechas durante el escaneo
reports.query:
MATCH t=((o:ORG)-[:HAS_SEG]->(seg:SEG)-[:HAS_VISIBILITY]->(sub:Subred)-[:HAS_IP]->(ip:IP)-[:HAS_PORT]->(p:Port))
WHERE o.org = $neodash_org_org
RETURN DISTINCT p.Date AS Fechas

reports.title: GRAFO DE TODA LOS ELEMENTOS INDUSTRIALES
FILTRO DINÁMICO DE BÚSQUEDA DE LOS ELEMENTOS INDUSTRIALES
